comment: How did this beer end up?  My wife and I want to brew one like this....hahaha
Everyone who dared to drink it loved it...next time i would use 12 oz of breastmilk and less coffee in secondary... Id use 3 to 4oz.....
I'm assuming you used actual breast milk for this.  Did you dry it out or just dump a bottle in?  did you put it in the boil?
